Try our best foods!
Our most famous food is the Xiaolongbao. It is a dumpling with rich juices and is extremely delicious. It is a very delicate dish but good nonetheless. We make food far more superior than Tetsutetsu which is loacted in America. If you happen to visit that sushi place, tell Brian he sucks and then dip.
